Title: Viewer Comments
Text:
I was brought to tears!
Moonlight Shines as Ever is an absolute tearjerker! Kudos to the brilliant scriptwriter who crafted such a heart-wrenching story. My tears just kept flowing even after the show ended!
Theater's Response: This Hero Play is based on real historical events. Thank you for sharing your experience.


Fiamma really whetted my appetite! Planning to bring some homemade Victor Savor by my aunt next time to savor during the performance. Can't wait!
Theater's Response: Thank you for your comment. You're welcome to bring your own snacks, but please be mindful of pungent smells.
